EncryptedPolynomial

public EncryptedPolynomial(java.math.BigInteger[] coefficients,
                           PublicKey pub)
                    throws BigIntegerClassNotValid
Constructs a single variable encrypted polynomial object of the form f(x) = (c_0 + c_1*x + c_2*x^2 + ... + c_n*x^n)

Parameters:
coefficients - the coefficients of the polynomial (c_0 + c_1*x + c_2*x^2 + ... + c_n*x^n)
pub - the public key associated with the polynomial
Throws:
BigIntegerClassNotValid
